body: You transform the physical makeup of a weapon as you desire. This spell functions like greater magic weapon, except that it subtly alters the physical properties of a weapon, enabling it to bypass damage reduction of one the following types: bludgeoning, cold iron, piercing, silver, or slashing. The affected weapon still inflicts damage of its normal type and its hardness and hit points are unchanged. This spell can be cast on a natural weapon or unarmed strike.
level_text: Arcanist: 3; Bard: 2; Bloodrager: 3; Hunter: 2; Hunter: 2; Magus: 3; Ranger: 2; Skald: 2; Sorcerer: 3; Wizard: 3

effects.text: one weapon or 50 projectiles, all of which must be together at the time of casting
